oscilloscup

Class Graphics2DPlotter

  • java.lang.Object
    • oscilloscup.Graphics2DPlotter

  • public class Graphics2DPlotter
extends java.lang.Object
    The Graphics2DPlotter is the component that paints the user's Graphics2D. The paint process is not implemented in a Swing component because the user may want to get a graphical representation of its 2D data without showing it on a user interface widget: for example the user may want to export the graphical representation to an image file or event directly print it.
